comments.body: In python, we do return a [gradient](https://cs.opensource.google/tensorflow/tensorflow/+/master:tensorflow/python/ops/nn_grad.py;l=540;drc=8052d528e9071dbe846b64b0cff3cf52de702c32) for the labels. Maybe add a TODO if you want to add this later.

I think for [Sparse Softmax Loss](https://cs.opensource.google/tensorflow/tensorflow/+/master:tensorflow/python/ops/nn_grad.py;l=544;drc=8052d528e9071dbe846b64b0cff3cf52de702c32?q=_sparsesoftmaxcross&sq=&ss=tensorflow%2Ftensorflow) the gradients for labels are null, right?
